email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a vessel, MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280m. The starting freight quote is $52.50 per ton. Laycan is 10th-15th October. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The vessel specs look good, but the freight rate is a bit high for us. Would you consider $50.75 per ton? Also, can we confirm the laycan as 12th-15th October? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can bring the rate down to $51.25 per ton, but that’s the best I can do. The laycan can be adjusted to 12th-15th October as requested. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 per ton works for us. Let’s proceed with MV Ocean Star. Can you confirm the demurrage rate? Also, please send over the charter party for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party draft by end of day. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. The demurrage rate is acceptable. I’ll review the charter party and get back to you by tomorrow. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, sounds good. Let me know if there are any issues with the charter party. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, Sarah
